Title: Intimate Stranger
Plot: Callisto makes a bargain with Ares, from Tarturus, to switch bodies with Xena, sending Xena into Tarturus and freeing Callisto. Xena, in Callisto's form, makes her own bargain with Hades, to make things right but the only problem is...she has one day to fix it.
GuestStars: Hudson Leick, Erik Thomson, David Te Rare
